TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/MenuBand extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::MenuBand abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains classes that provide objects for the parts of a menu band. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.MenuBand> class provides a foundation in which the following classes are defined:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.MenuBand.NewApplicationButton>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.MenuBand.Separator>
Each of these classes provides one or more properties that return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for each state of the menu band part specified by the class name.
